Played this game forever, but with the current ranking system i can not recomend comepetive play. use to be a high rank in the game quit playinjg for a while and had to rerank and it placed me in silver. from there it was literally impossible to rank up. Im talking winning 15-20 games in a row with 30+ kills  without ranking up then losing 1 game and losing a silver rank. for a game that is so built on it competive market it has one of the worst competitive ranking systems. im seriosly convinced the reason its still a secret and does not show your elo after all these years is because valve knows there shit is fucked up and does not know how to fix it/ just really dosen't care.
